## TextureCompareMode enum

Texture comparison mode for currently bound depth textures.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum TextureCompareMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  compareRefToTexture | <code>34894</code> | Compare the textures <code>r</code> component to the currently bound depth texture when sampling. The result of the comparison is assigned to the red channel. |
|  none | <code>0</code> |  |
